openstack_sharedfilesystem_share_access_.description: Configure a Shared File System share access list.

share_id.description: The UUID of the share to which you are granted access.

access_type.description: The access rule type. Can either be an ip, user,

access_to.description: The value that defines the access. Can either be an IP

access_level.description: The access level to the share. Can either be `rw` or `ro`.
